response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 1400000}
